Basis for Petition: This improvement was a lovely house at one time, adobe plastered. A reduction was granted in 1977 to $20,000. There is no insulation in the attic, it was rented last to a group of "Truck Brokers" who played dart games with the interior walls. Doors have been pulled off hinges, some without knobs, the sceptice tank cannot handle the load. During the past year it was rented off and on for an average of between $100 and $150 per month. Fire insurance was cancelled by the insurance company for apparently the same reasons listed above. We invite your inspection and verification of this statement. Thank you for your review.
Basis for Decision: N/A
Details of Outcome: Very limited reduction of 15% for both FCV and no change on LPV

Basis for Petition: WE did not make any improvements. As a matter of fact the buildings &  equipment are in worse condition now.

We invite your inspection and review of this property and we feel certain you will agree that the valuation placed on it is too high. Thank you.

Basis for Petition: 60 year old building in flood plane. Very little income due to economic obsolescence.
Basis for Decision: No change. The limited property value on your parcel has been reviewed. The limited property value has been calculated pursuant to ARS 42-13301(A). The limited property value on your valuation is the limited property value of the property in the preceding valuation year plus five percent of that value. Limited Property Value shall not exceed the current Full Cash Value.
